title: Now It Can Be Yours!  Units with yard available!
posting_body: My services are absolutely FREE, don’t hesitate to give me a call for assistance
If you're interested in more information about this property, or would like to review other available options, call/text or email me.
This apartment is  conveniently located in the Dallas suburb of McKinney, TX.
We are easily accessible and suitably located between the Dallas North Tollway and Highway 75, right in the heart of the master-planned Craig Ranchcommunity.
Additionally, our property is zoned within the highly esteemed Allen ISD school district.
Parkside at Craig Ranch offers an array of premium amenities and modern luxury living.
We offer efficiencies, 1- and 2-bedrooms, and 2-story townhomes with attached 2 car garages.
For your convenience, individual enclosed garages and/or interior storage units are also available for rent.
Our apartment homescome with high end, modern finishes such as granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, wood style flooring, and key-less door entries.
Each of our four phases have a multi-leveled covered resident parking garage facility.
To better assist you please provide us with the following:
Availability and pricing subject to change at any time.

LOVE WHERE YOU LIVE   apartment including stainless appliances found  showcasing a nice patio   laundry facilities   Walk-in closets,  Elevators   Sun deck overlooking views of the downtown Dallas skyline  Custom built-ins, Picnic Area    Beautiful Efficiency  ,  Hi-speed internet,  Access to upscale dining, shopping & entertainment   Best Loft apartment  ,  Wood Floors   Easy access to Dallas North Tollway
